posts.post_content:
Looking to see if anyone is interested in trading me one or more of the following 
t206 HOFers with a back other than: Piedmont(except Fac. 42), Sweet Cap, Sovereign, Old Mill or Polar Bear. Any pose on the ones with more than one.
Looking for cards in VG or better condition or lesser condition with a nice appearance. 

Baker
Brown
Collins, Eddie
Cobb
Joss
Keeler
Kelley
Lajoie
Waddell
Wallace
Walsh
Willis
Young

All offers welcome. Contact me at [url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Here is a link to what I have for trade [url]http://imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/sell[/url]

Thanks
Mike
